verses.roman:
yad ime nigṛhītāḥ syus
tvayaiva yadu-nandana
varo bhavān abhimato
duhitur me śriyaḥ-pate

synonyms: yat—if; ime—they; nigṛhītāḥ—subdued; syuḥ—become; tvayā—by You; eva—indeed; yadu-nandana—O descendant of Yadu; varaḥ—groom; bhavān—You; abhimataḥ—approved; duhituḥ—for the daughter; me—my; śriyaḥ—of the goddess of fortune; pate—O husband.
translation: If You can subdue them, O descendant of Yadu, You will certainly be the appropriate bridegroom for my daughter, O Lord of Śrī.
